name: American Airlines A321 Transcon First Class Suite...on a SFO-LAX shuttle??
description:
Sometimes aircraft changes work out in your favour! In this report, I'm lucky enough to bag a transcontinental A321 of American Airlines, on a routine hop between SFO and LAX. Showing the AAdmirals' Club at San Francisco, all phases of the flight, seat, and on board service...as well as a few sights and observations on the way. 

Enjoy the video, and leave a comment!
